Package com.mongodb.client.model

Class FindOneAndReplaceOptions

java.lang.Object
com.mongodb.client.model.FindOneAndReplaceOptions
public class FindOneAndReplaceOptions extends Object
The options to apply to an operation that atomically finds a document and replaces it.
Since:
3.0
MongoDB documentation
reference/command/findAndModify/

    • isUpsert

      public boolean isUpsert()
      Returns true if a new document should be inserted if there are no matches to the query filter. The default is false.

    • getReturnDocument

      public ReturnDocument getReturnDocument()
      Gets the ReturnDocument value indicating whether to return the document before it was replaced or after
      Returns:
